channel.title: Fletcher's Cloud Journey
channel.description: Recent content on Fletcher's Cloud Journey

item.title: My New Blog Home
item.description: Azure Static Web App So, I have spent the last few days / weeks deciding the best way to host a blog. Now I have a decidedly “split personality”. By this I mean I like to segregate my work and personal hobbies. This can be quite beneficial as this allows me to test a few things. A few key decisions Must be version controlled - good practice and forces me to get more familiar with git.

item.title: About
item.description: Who Am I? I am currently a Microsoft Employee, this is just my personal blog of Azure Code and Azure Experiences. I use mainly PowerShell. I have other repos focused on other scripting languages like az cli, Terrafrom and REST API calls. I am constatly testing, changing or adding contnet, I try to get the code/samples as accurate as possible. All round geek; Azure Cloud Advocate; PowerShell Scripter; #! Bash Junkee; FastTrack for Azure; Microsoft South Africa Employee; Tinkerer - #arduino, #ESP, #VSCode, #RPI #automatetheworld
